caption.p: Effects of catechin on the level of liver serum biochemical parameters in STZ-induced diabetic rats: ( A) Serum level of ALP, ( B) serum level of AST, ( C) serum level of SGPT, ( D) serum level of SGOT, ( E) serum level of creatinine in STZ-induced diabetic rats. The values are expressed as mean ± SEM. Each value corresponds to a mean of eight animals ### p < 0.001; comparison of a(normal control) vs. b(diabetic control) using Student’s t-test, ** p ˂ 0.01, *** p < 0.001; comparison of b(diabetic control) vs. c(Glibenclamide and CTN treated groups) using one way ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s post hoc multiple comparison test.
